summary: Completed admin panel implementation with password-based authentication, Products tab with full CRUD and image upload, Translations tab with grouped editable grid, and Publish/Status tab with revalidation controls. Created seed script to migrate products from data/products.ts. Fixed Prisma schema unique constraint. Product modal now has full form implementation. All API routes are complete with auto-revalidation. Ready for database migration and testing.
current_status: Admin panel fully implemented: authentication with httpOnly cookie, three main tabs (Products, Translations, Publish) with full functionality, API routes for products and translations, image upload with Sharp processing, seed script for product migration. Next steps: run Prisma migration, test login flow, and verify product/translation CRUD operations.
